Instruction: In a large salad bowl, combine the baby spinach, sliced strawberries, thinly sliced red onion, crumbled feta cheese, and chopped walnuts.
In a small bowl, whisk together balsamic vinegar, olive oil, honey, salt, and black pepper to make the dressing.
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss gently to coat all the ingredients evenly.
Serve the strawberry spinach salad immediately as a refreshing side dish or light meal.
